ValidationRule.description: Users cannot select approval stage rebid manually. Should use only quick action
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", IF( CQ_eQuote__c ,IF($Permission.CQ_Business_admin,true,false),true ), Quote_Type__c = 'CQ', ISCHANGED(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c ), AND( Text(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c) = 'Rebid', CQ_isRebid_Done__c = False ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The "Approval Stage" cannot be changed manually to "Rebid". Please use the "Rebid" button to rebid.
